def as_json(options={})
    h = (:only => [:id,:email,:provider,:full_name)
    h[:image]   = imageurl
    h[:thumb] = thumb
    h
end

def imageurl
   ActionController::Base.helpers.image_url(self.image.url)
end

def thumb
  ActionController::Base.helpers.image_url(self.image_url(:thumb))
end

This code solved my issue
